data.why:
Bioinformatics tool that finds repeats accross N FASTA sequences

    Usage: ‘Scriptname.pl’<-i> <-m> <-n> <-s> eg: -i2 -m80(Repeats of
    LENGTH 2 to MAXIMUM 80) -n99 (1 to 99 .FASTA files) (s)Modes of
    output -s2 Split output into seperate .txt files -s1 Single
    RESULTS.TXT -s3 True repeats into single RESULTS.TXT REPEATS.pl -n
    99 -i1 -m80 -s3
